QuestData.Title: Sealing the Way
QuestData.Description: The stone troggs have found a way to burrow up from underneath our homes!$B$BI've sent our geomancers to seal all of the buildings, but they need these reagents and enough time out of battle to properly cast their rockslide rituals.$B$BWhen you're done, report to, Gravel Longslab, just to the north on the Fractured Front.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help the Earthen Geomancers to get out of combat and then give them the Rockslide Reagents so that they can seal the Armory, Inn, Barracks, and Shrine.
QuestData.RewardText: This is good. We no longer need to worry about stone trogg attacks from the rear.$B$BLet's see what you can do for us on the front.
